name: Add Google Sheets rows for new Tally responses
description: Make will watch your Tally responses at regular intervals and add them to your Google Sheets as rows. Here's the [sheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1eC8lvurbQwg_xpQLdS6M0mVs-oViiDopiFR5SERd5Zk/edit?usp=sharing) used in this scenario.
